text:
Just wondering if anyone could help me out?
I'm new to HubSpot theme development. I've set everything up locally, and followed all the docs.

When I use hs watch, everything is uploaded, but when I preview changes I cannot see anything.
Does it work after a few seconds? Also have you tried busting the cache?
Also if it is a css partial that changes you need to publish the main stylesheet
So the file changes have gone live. But nothing front end. Iâ€™ve tried new browser and hard refresh
